fields.name: The Lucy Legging
fields.product_description: Buttery-soft fabric,  100% squat-proof and a functional fit. Our Lucy legging is our bestseller. It the classic essential legging designed for all-day comfort. A wardrobe staple that can be used for a workout or just lounging.

fields.name: The Lauren Hoodie
fields.product_description: Add the RENU Forest hoodie to your wardrobe for a cosy go-to. Featuring a super soft material with a front pocket and a drawstring hood. Take it to the gym or pair with jeans to dress it up.

fields.name: The Hanton Waterbottle
fields.product_description:
Our Hanton Waterbottle has a sleek, high-shine finish. It’s leak-proof design keeps contents hot for up to twelve hours and cold for up to twenty-four hours. A great option for when you're out and about, whether that means summer/winter gym sessions or for general use. 

Available in Orange, Pink and Turquoise.

fields.name: The Addie Sweatshirt
fields.product_description:
A simple hoodie can be your best friend in your wardrobe. The Addie Sweatshirt can be thrown over an outfit for a touch of practicality, styled to be your hero piece, or even just your go-to lounge item.  Versatile on every level, functional and crafted from soft-touch fabric for added comfort. 

Size up for an oversized fit.

fields.name: Power Legging
fields.product_description:
Our Power legging is the perfect Multi-sport gym legging,  designed for every workout. Super stretchy fabric with flattering seams to sculpt the bum. They are sweat-wicking and quick-drying for all sports.

Model wears size S and is 178cm/5'10" tall.

fields.name: The Rachel Sports Bra
fields.product_description:
Your training requires the right amount of support. Our Rachel Sports Bra is lightweight, breathable and features comfortable cups and supportive straps. Layer your look under a top or wear alone with your favourite leggings or shorts.

- Model is 5'10" and wears size S

fields.name: The Juliette Sports Bra
fields.product_description: Seamless designs mean comfort and confidence from workout to time out. Our Juliette Sports Bra is Looser and more inclusive silhouettes mean more ways to wear and more wearers to wear it. Sweat-wicking tech mean you’ll be cool, dry and focused on the days you’re moving more.

fields.name: The Evie Sports Bra
fields.product_description: Wide, comfy straps in a classic racerback design, the Evie Sports Bra feels snug and secure while you move. Smooth, lightweight fabric wicks sweat to keep you dry, comfortable and focused. For every rep, step and jump – know that you’re supported.

fields.name: The Lily Short
fields.product_description:
Our Essential Lightweight Training Shorts are built for everyday performance.

The Lily Short is designed to be as unrestrictive as possible, they feature mesh pockets and a woven fabric for maximum mobility. The waistband is fitted with internal drawcords for a custom fit that you can be comfy in all day long.

89% Polyester 11% Elastane

fields.name: Renu Exercise Ball
fields.product_description:
Extremely useful for all kinds of sessions, exercise balls provide endless workouts. The RENU exercise ball is designed with strong vinyl which prevents slipping, this is an essential accessory. This balls arrives deflated, with an air pump provided.

Diam: 65 cm. Weight: 150kgs. Inflated to 65cm

fields.name: Renu Dumbells
fields.product_description:
Our set of RENU Dumbells come with 2x2.5kg and 2x5kg weights.

These dumbbells are perfect for performing high intensity upper and lower body circuits which include bicep curls, shoulder presses, rowing movements, lunges and goblet squats

fields.name: Renu Bands Bundle
fields.product_description:
Take your workouts to the next level with our Renu bands Bundle, featuring our light, medium and heavyweight  bands.

Light Blue- Light resistance: 25lb, length: 33cm

Yellow - Medium resistance: 38.5lb, length: 38cm

Grey- Heavy resistance: 55lb, length: 43cm

fields.name: The Marie sweat
fields.product_description:
Our Marie Sweat features Ultra soft, mid weight cotton blend fleece with brushed interior for extra warmth, Crossover hood with drawcord adjust.

Wash garment inside out, Machine wash cold with like colors and Use only non chlorine bleach when needed.

fields.name: Renu Workout Bundle
fields.product_description:
The RENU workout bundle includes:

An Exercise mat
A sweat towel
2 x 2.5kg dumbells
1 x Exercise ball

Currently only available in candy pink.
Teal coming soon!

fields.name: The Audrey jogger
fields.product_description:
Our Yoga Jogger is soft to touch, slim fitting and designed with yoga & pilates in mind. Both lightweight and breathable with added stretch for unrestricted movement, you can't go wrong. 

Available in candy pink.

fields.name: Marnie crop top
fields.product_description:
SOFT, COMFORTABLE COVERAGE. The Yoga Crop Top adds sweat-wicking technology to soft, breathable fabric for lasting comfort. Its open neckline and side hem vents let you move freely from your first pose to your last.  Soft Feel: Lightweight, breathable fabric feels incredibly soft against your skin.

Perfect for Yoga and Pilates.

fields.name: The Tara tank top
fields.product_description: The Tara Tank is designed for all the ways you work out—from yoga to HIIT to long runs. This top defines luxury with buttery-soft and smooth fabric that breathes to keep you dry and cool.

fields.name: The Tia legging
fields.product_description:
Our Olive legging will work to keep you dry and comfortable while you push through the intensity of your toughest workouts. Soft, stretchy fabric hugs your body for gentle yet durable support. 

This product is made from at least 50% recycled polyester fibres.

fields.name: hannah tank top
fields.product_description:
Our Coral Tank ticks all the boxes. Soft, lightweight fabric (with plenty of stretch) wicks sweat and dries fast. It's also incredibly breathable with hits of mesh blended into a smooth and virtually seamless design. Feel confident knowing you can take on any workout in comfort. 

This product is made with at least 75% recycled nylon fibres.

fields.name: The Alice legging
fields.product_description:
Our Essential Mint leggings are made with cotton-rich, soft-touch fabric for easy, everyday wear. For additional comfort, we've designed these with a high-waisted wide waistband for a flattering fit that offers support.

The Essentials range is designed with the day-to-day in mind, whether you're training or taking time off.

Fabric: 95% Cotton 5% Elastane

Model is 5'9 and wears size L

fields.name: The LEO Sports Bra
fields.product_description:
Stay supported in the Power Mesh Grey Sports Bra, with removable cups and a breathable mesh back, you’ll be fit to fly through any workout.

88% nylon 12% elastane

fields.name: Grey 7/8 legging
fields.product_description:
7/8 leggings initially designed for fitness, that are perfect for everyday life.
A morning toning workout; a work meeting; an active walk between noon and 2; a quick stop at the shop to top up the fridge; time at home with the family or out with friends: our Grey 7/8 legging are perfect for all.

fields.name: The Michelle Co-ord
fields.product_description:
Our Michelle Sports Bra and Legging Co-ord gives us workout chic. Exercise in style or relax in style. 

This RENU bundle is for a limited time only.

fields.name: The Emma Co-ord
fields.product_description: A perfect combo for every workout. The Violet Co-Ord is the ideal gym outfit. Workout in style or add a sweatshirt for more of a lounge style.
